activities: We anticipate receiving personal information from European Union citizens, such as name and email address, for each visitor to our Web sites, our Web server automatically recognizes the visitor's domain name, browser type, operating system, entry page, exit page, resources accessed and average time on the Web site. This information is used to (1) authenticate the user to the site and to help us improve our Web site and to better understand our customer's needs.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
